name: Gov. Doug Burgum
tweet: North Dakota joins at least 10 other states in shifting to endemic status, which also will mean changes to how COVID-19 data is reported. Watch for more information soon from NDDoH at  https://t.co/PDmPTvacr9   4/4

name: Gov. Doug Burgum
tweet: As part of the shift to endemic, the @NDNationalGuard will end its COVID response March 17, concluding its largest and longest state mobilization ever. Deeply grateful for their lifesaving work along with @nddes and other state agencies in our whole-of-government approach. 3/

name: Gov. Doug Burgum
tweet: Endemic doesn't mean the virus is gone. It's still in our communities, but we now have more tools to fight the virus, protect our vulnerable population and maintain hospital capacity. We'll be maintaining response capability in case of another surge or new variant. 2/

name: Gov. Doug Burgum
tweet: With COVID-19 trends continuing to improve, today we announced that North Dakota is preparing to shift from pandemic to endemic status. Research, vaccines, treatments and at-home test kits have changed what we know about the virus and how we respond. 1/  https://t.co/nyfOXYJ0NO
